title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 98.2 - Petitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 98.2 - Petitions

State Regulations

Petitions for declaratory rulings shall: (a) Contain a statement that a declaratory
ruling is requested. (b) Include a
short concise statement of the state of facts or uncertainty with respect to
which a declaratory ruling is required, including a full disclosure of the
petitioner's interest. (c) Be
addressed to Counsel, State Liquor Authority, Two World Trade Center, New York, New York 10047. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
98.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
